DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine advantage interferential laser therapy shoulder pain reduction compare conventional low level laser therapy modality .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Interferential Laser Therapy Shoulder Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The spatiotemporal superposition two independent opposite beam laser generates constructive interference pattern increase therapeutic effect irradiate tissue . Patients diagnose shoulder pain different musculoskeletal disorder receive conventional interferential laser therapy . This comparative , randomize double - blind clinical study . Two identical equipment near infrared laser therapy use . Number session : 15 . Frequency session : daily . Irradiation technique : manual , contact punctual.Pain evaluate visual analog scale ( VAS ) rest analytical shoulder movement ( abduction , adduction , internal rotation , external rotation , flexion , extension ) mean pain disability index ( SPADI ) . Evaluations take place pre post treatment .
DOC.criteria: Acute chronic pain musculoskeletal origin Age 18 70 year Brachial plexus palsy Neurological diseases Pacemakers Shoulder pain cervical pathology Osteosynthesis material Fibromyalgia
